message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.SY 

This paper discusses the improvement of information retrieval and knowledge management in distributed information systems using distributed algorithms and biological network metaphors. The paper specifically discusses two adaptive recommendation systems, TalkMine and @ApWeb, which operate at the semantic and structural levels of information resources. These topics are closely related to information retrieval (cs.IR), social networks (cs.SI), data mining (cs.DL), machine learning (cs.LG), and control systems (cs.SY). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
